title: 7 Classic Body-Building Rules to Optimize Your Fitness
description:
With gyms re-opening in some states, find out what happened when Jillian was asked whether or not she thinks they’re safe. Plus, classic body-building rules for fitness, and email questions on fiber, counting macros for weight loss, and more!

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy


This Week’s Sponsors:

FACTOR75.COM, promo code JILLIAN for $60 off your 1st 2 weeks
